caption.title: Risk of RVFV transmission by vectors at the locations of previous outbreaks and at the main animal markets.
caption.p: (A) Risk of RVFV transmission by vectors at the locations where outbreaks from previous epidemics occurred. (B) Risk of RVFV transmission by vectors at the locations where the 51 main animal markets are located. Large blue circles represent the two markets with the highest risk (Birqash market in Giza governorate and Daraw market in Aswan).
